valsi.definition: time tense distance: medium distance in time.
evidential: I observe.
time tense distance: an unspecified distance in time
valsi.notes: Used to express a time distance without specifying any subjective notion about its size. May typically be used in a question when the subjective notion is not known. See also {za}, {zi}, {zu}, {ze'ai}

valsi.definition: forethought nonce-word indicator; indicates next word is nonce-creation and may be nonstandard.
abstractor: state (event) abstractor; $x_{1}$ is continuous state of [bridi] being true.
interval event contour: continuing too long after natural end of ...; superfective | ----RefEntity "gt".
digit/number: greater than.
discursive: further utterance ordinal
again; in addition to the first time; for the (RefEntity "gt" 1)th time
$x_{1}$ is a favorable connotation/sense/way-of-looking-at $x_{2}$ used by $x_{3}$.
$c_1$ the telemarketing business/activity/function for goods/products/services/activities $z_2$.
$p_1=z_1$ is a market place/square/area managed by $p_2$ for selling/trading $z_2$ by traders $z_3$.
$t_1$ is the thigh of $t_2=z_2$.
valsi.notes: The thigh is the area between the pelvis and the knee. Anatomically, it is part of the lower limb. Cf. {tuple}.

valsi.definition: 2-word letteral/shift: alternate alphabet selector follows.
$c_1$ is a marketing /business/activity/function for goods/products/services/activities $z_2$.
$c_1$ is the marketing communications business/activity/function supporting the sales/promotion of goods/products/services/activities $z_2$.
$z_1=s_1$ is a shop/store of market/mall $s_2$, selling $x_3=z_2$, operated by $x_4=z_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a gymnast at/performs gymnastics feat $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a spiny anteater of species $x_2$.
$x1=m1$ is a mill for grinding $x2=z2$ into $x3=z3$
$t_1$ is a patty of ground/pulverized material $t_2=z_2$, shape $t_3$, thickness $t_4$.
$x_{1}$ [individual or mass of hard surfaces] grinds/pulverizes/crushes $x_{2}$ into powder $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: May need mosra tanru. See also {daspo}, {purmo}, {marxa}, {pulce}, {canre}, {molki}.

valsi.definition: $b_1$ is na√Øve about $z_2$
$s_1=c_1=z_1$ is an oasis.
$l_1=z_3$ enjoys $z_1=l_2$.
$f_1=z_2$ (event/property) is determined by the good luck/fortune of $f_2$.
$zm_1=za_1$ is better than $zm_2$ in property $za_2$ according to standard $za_3$ by amount $zm_4$.
$t_1=z_1$ is most favourable among set/range $t_4$ in property $z_2$ according to standard $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ approves of/gives favor to plan/action $x_{2}$ (object/event).
$f_2$ is lucky/fortunate in $f_1=z_2$ (event/property).
$x_1$ is welcomed by $x_2$ to place/event $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a market/store/exchange/shop(s) selling/trading (for) $x_{2}$, operated by/with participants $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also: mall, marketplace, shopping center, cooperative, bazaar, trading post, mart; the concept is the function of selling/exchanging coupled with a location, and is more oriented to the larger concept of marketplace than the stalls/shops that comprise it, though it does not exclude the latter individual shops (= {zaisle}); $x_3$ may include both owners/proprietors and customers in some markets, but in most contexts refers only to the operators. See also {vecnu}, {canja}, {dinju}, {banxa}.

valsi.definition: $z_1=c_1$ accepts $z_2=c_2$ (object/event) from source $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the buttock(s)/arse/rear/seat [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: rounded surface, support].
valsi.notes: Also ass, behind, butt. See also {ganxo}, {mabla}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is temporary memory for fact(s) $s_2=m_2$ in containment $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ is temporary/not permanent/expected to change in property $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard/expectant $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ exists/is real/actual/reality for $x_{2}$ under metaphysics $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. $x_1$ is physical (one sense). See also {fatci}, {xanri}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ pauses/temporarily halts activity/process/state $s_2$.
$x_1$ rents $x_2$ [goods/service/commodity] to $x_3$ for cost $x_4$ for duration $x_5$
$f_1$ discovers the existence of $x_2=z_1$ under metaphysics $z_3$.
$r_1=z_1$ exists over interval $r_2$.
valsi.notes: $r_1=z_1$ is $r_2$ years/days etc. old. Not restricted to biological forms. Cf. {zasti}, {ranji}, {temci}, {ditcu}, {jbena}, {morsi}, {cfari}, {fanmo}, {jmive}.

valsi.definition: zanru modal, 1st place approved by ...
$c_1=z_1$ praises $z_2$ (object/event) for audience $c_3$ via expressive medium $c_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of soap from source $x_{2}$ of composition including $x_{3}$.
$c_1$ is a/the production/building/assembling function/activities involving person(s) $c_2=z_1$(ind./mass) making/building/assembling $z_2$ out of $z_3$.
$c_1$ is/are the function/activities involving persons $c_2$ developing products $f_2=z_2$ made by $z_1$; $c_1$ is product development.
$g_1$ is a/the industry sector of $z_1$ building/assembling/constructing $g_2=z_2$ $z_3=g_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a bay in/of coast/shoreline $x_{2}$.
$s_1$ is the engineering/technology of/behind products $z_2$ made of materials/parts/components $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ makes/assembles/builds/manufactures/creates $x_{2}$ out of materials/parts/components $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Should not be used to express causation. Cf. {cupra}, {larcu}, {rutni}, {finti}, {gundi}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a pedestal/base/stand/pallet supporting $x_{2}$ (object/event), of materials/properties $x_{3}$.
$b_1$ is a handkerchief of type/material $b_2$.
$k_1$ is a/are whisker(s)/hair on/in the nose of $k_2=n_2$.
$s_1$ sniffles fluid/gas/powder $s_2$ through the nose.
$z_2=j_2$ is a rhinoceros of species/type $x_2$
$v_1$ breathes gas $v_2$ producing nasal sound; $v_1$ snorts.
$b_1$ is outdoors.
$c_1$ is homeless.
$v_1$ is a hall door/front door of nest/house/lair/den $v_2=z_1=c_2$.
$x_1$ is a slipper/houseshoe for covering/protecting/keeping warm [feet] $x_2$, and of material $x_3$.
$x_1$ is a building that is the house/home/nest/den of/for $x_2$.
$x_1=c_1$ leaves/departs/separates from the house inhabited by $x_2=z_2=c_2$, along route $x_3=c_3$
$n_1$ is indoors.
$x_{1}$ is a nest/house/lair/den/[home] of/for $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Home (= {tercnizda}), house (constructed building) (= {zdadi'u}). See also {dinju}, {ginka}, {kumfa}, se {xabju}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is a house servant in/of house $z_1$ owned by person $s_2=z_2$.
$s_1=z_2$ stays home/is nidicolous.
$z_2=c_1=b_1$ is bored, lacking amusement $c_2=z_1$.
$x_1$ is a swing (hanging seat)
$f_1=z_1$ (event) teases $f_2=z_2$.
$x1=z2=l1$ has fun with $x2=z1=l2$
$x_1=g_1$ entertains (agentive) $x_3=z_2$ with $x_2=z_1$; $g_1$ makes $z_1$ entertaining/amusing for $z_2$ in property/aspect $z_3$
$x1=k1$ is a parlor/[living room] in structure $x2=k2$ for entertaining $x3=z2$
$x_{1}$ (abstract) is amusing/entertaining to $x_{2}$ in property/aspect $x_{3}$; $x_{3}$ is what amuses $x_{2}$ about $x_{1}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ occupies $x_2$ pleasantly; $x_1$ is fun for $x_2$; $x_2$ is amused by $x_1$; $x_2$ has fun (at) doing $x_1$; $x_1$ is an amusement/entertainment/game for $x_2$. See also {cinri}, {panka}, {xajmi} for funny, {kelci}.

valsi.definition: $l_1=z_1$ is an anecdote/funny story/joke about plot/subject/moral $l_2$ by storyteller $l_1$ to audience $l_4=z_2$, amusing in aspect $x_5=z_3$.
$x_1$ is a roller-coaster
$p_1$ is a park managed by polity/community $p_2$ for use by $z_2$, with amenities/amusements $z_1$.
$x_1$ is a merry-go-round
$x_1$ is a Ferris wheel
$x_1$ is a chinaberry of variety $x_2$.
$x1=zd2=zu1$ plays at $x2=zd1=zu2$
valsi.notes: as opposed to playing with a toy object

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a Bactrian camel of breed $x_2$.
$z_1=t_1$ is Asia.
$x_1$ is a durian (Durio zibethinus) of breed $x_2$
digit/number: 7 (digit) [seven].
time tense interval: a medium length of time.
time tense: a medium time interval offset towards the future; (tense/modal).
time tense: a medium time interval spanning the present; (tense/modal).
time tense interval: an unspecified amount of time
valsi.notes: Used to express a duration without specifying any subjective notion about its length. May typically be used in a question when the subjective notion is not known. See also {ze'a}, {ze'i}, {ze'u}, {ze'e}, {za'ai}

valsi.definition: time tense: a medium time interval offset towards the past; (tense/modal).
time tense interval: the whole of time.
nonce word with existing grammar
valsi.notes: Binds two arbitrary words together to form a nonce word whose semantics are indicated by the left word and whose grammar is the same as that of the right word. Useful for creating function words without having to allocate experimental cmavo forms.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is an evergreen tree of species/variety $x_2$.
time tense interval: an instantaneous/tiny/short amount of time.
$d_2$ is/are the short-term indebtedness/liabilities of company/corporation/firm $d_1$ to creditor(s) $d_3$ for the provision of goods /services/loans $d_4$.
location tense relation/direction; beyond/outward/receding from ...
time tense interval: a long amount of time.
$d_2$ is/are the long-term indebtedness/liabilities of company/corporation/firm $d_1$ to creditor(s) $d_3$ for the provision of goods /services/loans $d_4$.
joins preceding and following words into a lujvo.
number/quantity: 7,000 expressed with comma.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) is a punishable crime/[taboo/sin] to people/culture/judges/jury $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a Sunday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Sunday is either day seven or day zero, depending on your perspective.

valsi.definition: July.
$x_1$ is July/the seventh month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$j_1$ has the rank of Major General/Rear Admiral/Air Vice-Marshal (equivalent of NATO OF-7) in military unit /organization $j_2$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {ze}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {bivmoija'a}, {xavmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

valsi.definition: Uranus.
$p_1$ is the seventh closest planet (default is Uranus if p2 is the Sun) revolving around $p_2$ (default is the Sun), with planetary characteristics $p_3$, orbital parameters $p_4$.
quantified selbri: convert 7 to ordinal selbri; $x_{1}$ is seventh among $x_{2}$ ordered by rule $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (experiencer) increases/is incremented/augmented in property/quantity $x_{2}$ by amount $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ increases/augments $x_2$ (experiencer) in property/quantity $x_3$ by amount $x_4$.
number/quantity: 70 [seventy].
number/quantity: 700 [seven hundred].
$r_1$ (event/state) increases/increments/augments $x_2=z_1$ in property/quantity $x_3=z_2$ by amount $x_4=z_3$.
$x_{1}$ is $10^{-21}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
valsi.notes: (cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zetro)

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is guilty of crime $x_2$ accountable to judge/authority $x_3$.
$x_1$ accuses $x_2$ of charge/crime $x_3$ before judge/authority $x_4$.
$g_1$ (person/agent) commits a crime $g_2=z_1$, punishable to people/culture/judges/jury $x_3=z_2$.
$j_1$ borrows $j_2$ from $j_3$ without permission of $z_2$.
$k_1$ is a poacher on prey/quarry/game $k_2$, punishable to people/culture/judges/jury $x_3=z_2$.
$l_1$ steals $l_2$ from $l_3$, which is a crime according to $z_2$.
$x_1$ is zerumbet/shell ginger of species/variety $x_2$.
valsi.notes: This is Alpinia zerumbet. Zingiber zerumbet (awapuhi) is {krelu'i} {zingibero}. See also {glangala}.

valsi.definition: $f_1$ is innocent/not guilty of crime $x_2=f_2=z_1$ (action/state) to judge/authority $f_3$.
$xr_1=z_1$ is a violent crime, injuring/harming/damaging victim $xr_2$ in property $xr_3$ (ka), resulting in injury $xr_4$.
$g_1$ commits a violent crime $g_2=z_1=xr_1$, injuring/harming/damaging victim $x_3=xr_2$ in property $x_4=xr_3$ (ka), resulting in injury $x_5=xr_4$.
$x_{1}$ is $10^{21}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$k_{1}$ comes/goes out/forth towards destination $k_{2}$ from origin $k_{3}$ via route $k_{4}$ using means/vehicle $k_{5}$.
$x_1$ is the parallax of $x_2$ as seen by $x_3$ who moves to $x_4$ from $x_5$
$x_{1}$ observes/[notices]/watches/beholds $x_{2}$ using senses/means $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Behold/watch/gaze (= {vi'azga}); guard/watchman/sentinel (= {zgaku'i}, {jdeku'i}). See also cmavo list {ga'a}, {ganse}, {viska}, {catlu}, {tirna}, {pencu}, {sumne}, {kurji}, {canci}, {catlu}, {jarco}, {lanli}, {pinka}, {simlu}.

valsi.definition: $t_1=z_1$ listens to $t_2=z_2$ against background noise $t_3$ under conditions $z_4$.
$v_1$ is a surveillance aircraft of type/for carrying $v_2$, propelled by $v_3$.
$x_1=c_1$ is a musical instrument played by $x_2=c_3$.
$f_1$ is a musical event with music $x_2=z_1$ performed/produced by $x_3=z_2$ (event).
$f_1$ composes music $f_2=z_1$ for purpose $f_3$.
$x_1=z_2=g_1$ is a band that has members $x_2$ and plays music $x_3=z_1$.
$k_1$ is a music note (tone).
$s_1$ is a music note (symbol).
$k_1$ is a glass harp/musical glass, performed by $z_2$ (event).
$x_{1}$ is music performed/produced by $x_{2}$ (event).
valsi.notes: $x_2$ event may be person playing instrument, singing, musical source operating/vibrating, etc.; instrument (= {zgica'a}); play an instrument (= {zgica'apli}, {zgiterca'a}, {selzgigau}, {selzgizu'e}); song (= {sagzgi}, {selsa'a}); voice, as used musically (= {zgivo'a}); composed music (= {finzgi}). See also {damri}, {dansu}, {flani}, {janbe}, {jgita}, {pipno}, {rilti}, {tabra}, {tonga}, {xagri}, {siclu}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a form of pop music performed by $x_2$ with characteristics $x_3$.
$f_2=z_1$ is a musical composition composed by $f_1$for function/purpose $f_3$ from existing elements/ideas $f_4$.
$s_1$ is musicology with methodology $s_2$.
$t_1$ is a music instrument used for producing sound $t_2=z_1$.
$x_1$ is a damselfly of species $x_2$.
time tense distance: instantaneous-to-short distance in time.
joins relative clauses which apply to the same sumti.
$j_1$ is the right for $z_1$ to do $z_2$ (event/state).
$z_1=b_1$ becomes free to do/be $x_2$ (event/state) under conditions $x_3$.
$v_1$ is a fu'ivla-form word meaning $v_2$ (in Lojban); $v_1$ is morphologically a fu'ivla.
valsi.notes: Generalization of {fu'ivla} to include non-borrowings; specialization of {fu'ivla} to exclude non-Lojban words.

valsi.definition: $j_1$ is the right for $z_1$ to do $z_2$ (event/state).
pro-sumti: fills a sumti place, deleting it from selbri place structure;changes selbri semantics.
$x_1$ releases $x_2$ to do/be $x_3$ under conditions $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is free/at liberty to do/be $x_{2}$ (event/state) under conditions $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also unrestricted, unfettered, unconstrained; (adjective:) independent; (adverb:) willingly, voluntarily, freely, may, optionally; (potential:) $x_1$ voluntarily does $x_2$. See also {pinfu}, {rinju}, {bilga}, {curmi}, {kakne}, {frili}.

valsi.definition: $z_1=j_1$ is a sovereign state having supreme, independent authority over $j_2$ (people/territory).
$z_1$ is a line with the shape of a zigzag.
$x_1$=$d_1$ is information gathered/produced by method/from source $x_2$=$d_3$.
valsi.notes: not necessarily meaningful or about anything

valsi.definition: $f_2$ (ka) is an ordinary / common / general / typical / usual property among $f_3$.
valsi.notes: Made of {zi'o} + {fadni}. See also {kampu} for the fully-universal sense.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ numbers/adds up to/consists of $x_2$ (number) counting by units $x_3$; $x_1$ are $x_2$ in number.
$x_1$ has probability $x_2$ of occurring.
$t_1$ is a tanru component.
$x_1$ is Zimbabwean in aspect $x_2$.
Zimbabwe.
$x_1$ is ginger of species $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of zinc (Zn); [metaphor: hard metal].
$x_1=dzipo_1=cipni_1$ is a penguin of species $x_2=cipni_2$.
$d_1=t_1$ is Antarctica
$l_1$ is bad Lojban.
$x_{1}$ is purple/violet [color adjective].
$x_1$ is a plum [fruit] of species/variety $x_2$
$x_1=z_1$ is crimson/carmine/ruby/cerise/deep red.
$x_{1}$ (agent) invests resources $x_{2}$ in investment $x_{3}$ expecting return/profit $x_{4}$ (object(s)/event).
valsi.notes: [also ties up/Risks/gambles. $x_1$ is an investor; $x_2$ are invested assets of $x_1$; bond (= {jertervle})]; See also {prali}, {canja}, {jbera}, {dejni}, {ponse}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ exceeds/is more than $x_{2}$ in property/quantity $x_{3}$ (ka/ni) by amount/excess $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also positive (= {nonmau}). See also cmavo list {mau}, {mleca}, {zenba}, {jmina}, {bancu}, {dukse}, {traji}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is greater than or equal to $x_2$ in property/quantity $x_3$ by amount/excess $x_4$.
$z_1=n_1$ is a positive number relative to origo $z_2$.
$n_1$ prefers $n_2=z_1$ over $z_2$, because of property/quantity $z_3$, by margin $z_4$.
$x_{1}$ is automatic in function $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
quote next word only; quotes a single Lojban word (not a cmavo compound or tanru).
$x_1$ is a nonsense zei-lujvo using parts $x_2$, silly by standard $x_3$.
valsi.notes: This lujvo parses in jbofi'e as an artifact of how high precedence {zei} is, and how {zo} erasure works. Specifically, [zo WORD si] has not erased the entire {zo} clause but has killed {zo}'s "magic". {fa'o} and quoted {si} are replaceable, but thrown in for fun, to have a full magic-word lujvo.

valsi.definition: location tense relation/direction; tangential to/passing by ...
pro-sumti: an elliptical/unspecified value; has some value which makes bridi true.
Something associated with; equivalent to ''zo'e pe''.
valsi.notes: There are a lot of cases where people use "tu'a" where they actually mean zo'ei; once I noticed the usefulness of such a word to elide whole chunks of sentences, I started wanting it all the time. -camgusmis

valsi.definition: location tense relation/direction; nearer than .../inward/approaching from ...
attitudinal modifier: humorously - dully - seriously.
letteral: humor symbol, ":-)" and its related forms expressing humor (letteral).
attitudinal modifier: humorously - dully - seriously.
quote next non-Lojban word only; quotes a single non-Lojban word delimited by pauses (in speech) or whitespace (in writing)
attitudinal modifier: humorously - dully - seriously.
marks end of logical prenex quantifiers/topic identification and start of sentence bridi.
delimited non-Lojban quotation; the result treated as a block of text.
time tense distance: long distance in time.
location tense relation/direction; leftwards/to the left of ...
zukte modal, 1st place (purposed agent) with goal-seeking actor ...
$z_{1}=d_1$ intends/wishes to do $z_{2}=d_2$ for $z_{3}=d_3$.
pro-sumti: the typical sumti value for this place in this relationship; affects truth value.
abstractor: activity (event) abstractor; $x_{1}$ is abstract activity of [bridi] composed of $x_{2}$.
discursive: on the one hand - on the other hand.
discursive: on the one hand - on the other hand.
common cold
$z_1=xu_1$ confesses guilt about $z_2$ (abstraction).
$r_1=z_1$ is busy doing $z_2$ for purpose/goal $z_3$.
$z_1=p_1$ is a volitional thinker considering taking action $z_2=p_2$ toward end/goal $z_3$
$p_2=z_2$ is a policy of $p_3=z_3$ (nu) prescribed by $p_1$.
$s_1=z_1$ honors $s_2$ with action $z_2$.
$t_1$ is the manner of action $t_2=z_2$ under condition $t_3$.
$m_1=z_1$ is [busy doing]/[working hard at] $z_2$ for purpose/goal $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a volitional entity employing means/taking action $x_{2}$ for purpose/goal $x_{3}$/to end $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also acting at, undertaking, doing; agentive cause with volition/purpose; also $x_3$ objective, end. See also cmavo list {zu'e}, {bapli}, {gunka}, {jalge}, {krinu}, {mukti}, {rinka}, {snuti}, {gasnu}, {fasnu}, {minji}, {prenu}, {ciksi}, {jibri}, {pilno}, {pluta}, {tadji}, {tutci}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ gives advice $z_2$ to $s_3=z_1$.
$c_1=t_1=z_1$ is the executive branch of the government of people/territory/domain/subjects $t_2$ of organizational type $c_2$ with components $c_3$.
$b_1=z_1$ goes jogging on surface $b_2$ for purpose $z_3$.
valsi.notes: To run volitionally and steadily, especially for exercise.

valsi.definition: $k_1$ has volition/is a volitional entity.
$xa_1=z_1$ is a/the left hand of $xa_2=z_2$, which faces/in-frame-of-reference $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of maize/corn [grain] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ feels guilt/remorse about $x_{2}$ (abstraction).
$x_{1}$ is to the left/left-hand side of $x_{2}$ which faces/in-frame-of-reference $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also $x_3$ is the standard of orientation for $x_2$. See also cmavo list {zu'a}, {pritu}, {mlana}, {crane}, {trixe}, {farna}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is a consonant sound made by articulation $z_1$ (event/state).
$x_{1}$ (evt./state) interferes with/hinders/disrupts $x_{2}$ (evt./state/process) due to quality $x_{3}$ (ka).
valsi.notes: Also blocks, obstructs, baffles; not necessarily forcing cessation. See also {fanta}, {dicra}, {fliba}, {fanza}, {raktu}, {klina}, {bandu}, {cfipu}, {ganlo}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ sits [assumes sitting position] on surface $x_{2}$.
$c_1$ requests/invites $z_1=c_3$ [to attend]/[be present at] $z_2$ (event/location) in manner/form $c_4$.
$x_1=facki_1$ finds/locates $x_2=zvati_1=facki_3$ (object) at $x_3=zvati_2$ (event/location)
$x_1=s_1$ looks for $x_2=z_1$ at location(s) $x_3=s_3=z_2$
valsi.notes: $s_2$ = "lo ka $z_1$ zvati ce'u", so is eliminated. Derived from {zvati} and {sisku}.

valsi.definition: $l_1$ is a list/catalog/register of objects/events $l_2=z_1$ (sequence/set) present at/attending $x_3=z_2$ (event/location).
$x_{1}$ (object/event) is at/attending/present at $x_{2}$ (event/location).
valsi.notes: Atemporal; location equivalent of {cabna}. Refers to a nonce location for an object/activity that is mobile. (cf. especially stuzi for an inherent/inalienable location, jbini, nenri, se vasru, cpana, diklo, jibni, cabna, lamji, tcini, xabju, jmive, jundi, vitke)

valsi.definition: letteral for z.
